ygData.subject: RE: What about the lvl 24 song?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I keep hearing this and hopefully this will make you all realize that the see invis song is still useful. Clouding only gives party see invis. In other
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Tim Burke" <tjohnburke@...>
>
> Now that they fixed the clouding song...
>
> Wat was the plan for the lvl 24 see invis song?
>
> Does anybody remember the discussion? Is this just another
> useless song that they are going to expect us to deal with...
>


I keep hearing this and hopefully this will make you all realize that the
see invis song is still useful. Clouding only gives party see invis. In
other words, the only invis you can see are the members of your party that
you have invissed. You do not see all invisible creatures and players, only
those in your party.

If you want to see something that is invis outside of your party, see invis
is still the way to go.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 50 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
